metadata.name: Pagination
metadata.description: Navigation component for breaking up large datasets into multiple pages with user-friendly controls

onPageChange.description: Callback fired when user navigates to a different page

showFirst.description: Whether to show 'First' button for quick navigation to page 1

showLast.description: Whether to show 'Last' button for quick navigation to final page

showPrevNext.description: Whether to show Previous and Next navigation buttons

maxVisible.description: Maximum number of page buttons to show before using ellipsis
maxVisible.validation: Must be >= 3 for proper ellipsis behavior

size.description: Size variant affecting button dimensions and typography

variant.description: Visual style variant for different design contexts

hideOnSinglePage.description: Whether to hide pagination when totalPages is 1

showPageInfo.description: Whether to show 'Page X of Y' information text

className.description: Additional CSS classes for custom styling

guidelines: 2.1.1 - Keyboard navigation support for all controls
4.1.2 - Name, Role, Value for all interactive elements

aria.nav: Required nav element wrapper with aria-label
aria.aria-label: Navigation labeled as 'Pagination' or custom label
aria.aria-current: Set to 'page' on current page button
aria.role: button role on all clickable elements

accessibility.screenReader: Each button clearly announces its purpose, current page status, and total pages context

navigation.pageSelection: Clicking any page number navigates to that page
navigation.boundaryControls: First/Last buttons jump to page 1 or final page
navigation.adjacentControls: Prev/Next buttons move by one page
navigation.disabledStates: First/Prev disabled on page 1, Last/Next disabled on final page
navigation.ellipsis: Shows '...' when page range exceeds maxVisible limit

ellipsisLogic.startEllipsis: Appears when current page is far from beginning
ellipsisLogic.endEllipsis: Appears when current page is far from end
ellipsisLogic.smartRanging: Always shows current page ± 1 when possible

responsive.mobile: Reduces maxVisible to 3-5 pages, prioritizes Prev/Next
responsive.tablet: Standard behavior with full control set
responsive.desktop: Full pagination with all requested controls visible

examples.name: Basic Pagination
examples.description: Standard pagination with all default features

examples.name: With Ellipsis (Large Dataset)
examples.description: Pagination handling many pages with ellipsis compression

examples.name: Minimal Variant
examples.description: Clean, minimal pagination for subtle interfaces

examples.name: Pills Variant with Custom Labels
examples.description: Rounded pill-style pagination with Norwegian labels

examples.name: Compact Mobile-Friendly
examples.description: Optimized for mobile with essential controls only

unit: Renders correct number of page buttons based on maxVisible
Applies active state to current page correctly
Handles page change callbacks with correct page numbers
Shows ellipsis when appropriate based on page range
Applies size and variant classes correctly
Hides component when hideOnSinglePage is true and totalPages is 1
integration: Works with data fetching libraries for page-based APIs
Integrates with URL routing for shareable pagination states
Handles rapid page changes without race conditions
Maintains state consistency during parent re-renders
accessibility: Has proper nav wrapper with aria-label
All buttons have descriptive accessible names
Keyboard navigation works for all interactive elements
Screen reader announces page changes clearly
Focus management preserves user context during navigation
visual: All size variants render with correct dimensions
Variant styles apply correctly (default, pills, minimal)
Active page stands out clearly from inactive pages
Component adapts to different container widths
performance: Renders efficiently with large totalPages values
Page change handlers don't cause unnecessary re-renders
Ellipsis calculation is optimized for frequent updates
Memory usage stays constant regardless of totalPages

nsm.reasoning: Navigation component with no sensitive data handling, only manages page state

language.localization: Supports custom labels for Norwegian interface text

security.xss: All user-provided labels are properly escaped
security.injection: No dynamic code execution or eval usage
security.disclosure: No sensitive information exposed in DOM or callbacks
